iti95:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti95:2.1: “Mendicants, there are these three ways of being provided with sensual pleasures.
iti95:2.3: Some sensual pleasures are simply present; some are for those who love to create; and some are for those who control the creations of others.
iti95:2.4: These are the three ways of being provided with sensual pleasures.”
iti95:2.5: That is what the Buddha said.
iti95:3.2: Gods Who Control the Creations of Others,
iti95:3.4: and others who indulge in sensual pleasures—
iti95:3.5: They go from this state to another,
iti95:4.2: in sensual indulgence, an astute person
iti95:5.1: Having cut the stream so hard to pass,
iti95:5.2: that’s tied to pleasant seeming things,
iti95:6.1: Seers of the noble truths, knowledge-masters,
iti95:6.3: directly know the ending of rebirth,
iti95:6.4: they come not back to future lives.”
iti95:7.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
